title: Global automotive industry : capacity and assembly volume 2015/2022
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 2 different Countrys on X-axis for 6 groups North America, EU, Eastern Europe, Asia-Pacific, Middle East & Africa, and South America. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding SOME LABEL.
Out of all 6 groups, Asia-Pacific had the highest SOME LABEL in Country 2022 and Middle East & Africa had the lowest SOME LABEL in Country 2015.
Among all the Countrys, North America had the highest SOME LABEL in Country 2022 and lowest SOME LABEL in Country 2015.
The maximum SOME LABEL for North America that was found in Country 2022 was 1.15 times larger than the minimum SOME LABEL observed in Country 2015.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart shows SOME LABEL on the Y-axis for 2 different Countrys for 6 groups North America, EU, Eastern Europe, Asia-Pacific, Middle East & Africa, and South America that are presented on the X-axis.
Out of all 6 groups, Asia-Pacific had the highest SOME LABEL in Country 2022 and Middle East & Africa had the lowest SOME LABEL in Country 2015.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 2 different Countrys on X-axis for 6 groups North America, EU, Eastern Europe, Asia-Pacific, Middle East & Africa, and South America. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding SOME LABEL.
Out of all 6 groups, Asia-Pacific had the highest SOME LABEL in Country 2022 and Middle East & Africa had the lowest SOME LABEL in Country 2015.
Among all the Countrys, North America had the highest SOME LABEL in Country 2022 and lowest SOME LABEL in Country 2015.
The maximum SOME LABEL for North America that was found in Country 2022 was 1.15 times larger than the minimum SOME LABEL observed in Country 2015.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 2 different Countrys on X-axis for 6 groups North America, EU, Eastern Europe, Asia-Pacific, Middle East & Africa, and South America. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding SOME LABEL.
In Country 2022, Asia-Pacific had the highest SOME LABEL 770.0 among the 6 groups and in 2015, Middle East & Africa had the lowest SOME LABEL 37.0.
In Country 2022, North America had the highest SOME LABEL among all 2 Countrys and it has the lowest SOME LABEL in Country 2015.
The maximum SOME LABEL for North America that was found in Country 2022 was 1.15 times larger than the minimum SOME LABEL observed in Country 2015.
Among all 6 groups, Asia-Pacific had the gap of 89.0 between the maximum and minimum SOME LABEL observed in Country 2022 and 2015 respectively.
Asia-Pacific had the maximum SOME LABEL out of all 6 groups in Country 2022 followed by Asia-Pacific in 2022, and the minimum SOME LABEL is found for Middle East & Africa in 2015.

On average, the Country 2022 had the highest SOME LABEL for all 6 groups North America, EU, Eastern Europe, Asia-Pacific, Middle East & Africa, and South America. Whereas 2015 had the lowest average SOME LABEL.
